title: Bradley Cooper's Role In 'Limitless' Is 'Very Powerful & Very Scary'
text: Bradley Cooper keeps it cool and casual in a backwards cap and as he makes his way out of a private movie screening on Sunday (October 11) in Beverly Hills, Calif. The 40-year-old actor’s Limitless co-star Jake McDorman, who plays Brian Finch on the new show, recently revealed how Bradley‘s character will be different in [...] »
